title: [Volcanic Slope, Abyss]
description: Where granite gives way to the native basalt of the mountainside, any further movement upward is blocked by a deep slash.  It sunders the peak's side in a grievous wound that penetrates so deeply, the bottom is lost in darkness.  Nothing grows on the lips of the abyss other than a few patches of moss.  Mist drifts on air currents rising from the depths, illuminated by moonlight playing over the fog's insubstantial undulations.

Where granite gives way to the native basalt of the mountainside, any further movement upward is blocked by a deep slash.  It sunders the peak's side in a grievous wound that penetrates so deeply, the bottom is lost in shadow.  Nothing grows on the lips of the abyss other than a few patches of moss.  Mist drifts on air currents rising from the depths in a ghostly dance.
